wblut.hemesh

Class HEC_AlphaShape

  • java.lang.Object
    • wblut.hemesh.HEC_Creator
      • wblut.hemesh.HEC_AlphaShape

  • public class HEC_AlphaShape
extends HEC_Creator
    Creates the convex hull of a collection of points.
    Author:
    Frederik Vanhoutte (W:Blut)
